name: IATI Identifier
description: A globally unique identifier for the activity. This MUST be prefixed with EITHER the current IATI organisation identifier for the reporting organisation (reporting-org/@ref) OR a previous identifier reported in other-identifier, and suffixed with the organisation’s own activity identifier. The prefix and the suffix should be separated by a hyphen “-“. Once an activity has been reported to IATI its identifier MUST NOT be changed in subsequent updates.

name: Last Updated Datetime
description: The date and time the activity was last updated. This helps users to know when the data was refreshed and ensures they have the most current information.

name: Language
description: The language used in the activity's narrative and descriptions. It helps in understanding and processing the information based on the specified language.

name: Default Currency
description: The currency that is used by default for reporting financial data associated with the activity. It's critical for financial accountability and transparency.

name: Humanitarian
description: A boolean value indicating whether the activity is of a humanitarian nature. This captures the essence and focus of the activity.

name: Hierarchy
description: A numerical indicator of the hierarchical level of the activity within the organization’s structure, detailing the extent and reach of the activity.

name: Linked Data URI
description: A URI that links to additional data or information related to the activity, supporting interoperability and data sharing.

name: Budget Not Provided
description: A field that indicates if the budget information for the activity is not provided. This helps organizations understand data completeness.

name: Reporting Organisation Reference
description: The unique identifier for the reporting organisation. This references the organisation that is reporting the activity and is essential for accountability and traceability.

name: Reporting Organisation Type
description: The type of organisation that is reporting the activity, which provides context on the organisation's role and identity in the reporting process.

name: Secondary Reporter
description: A boolean value indicating whether the reporting organisation is considered a secondary reporter. This helps identify organisations involved in multiple roles in the reporting process.

name: Reporting Organisation Narrative
description: A narrative description of the reporting organisation, providing additional context, background, and information that helps understand the organisation’s role.

name: Reporting Organisation Narrative Language
description: The language used for the narrative description of the reporting organisation. This ensures clarity and comprehension according to language preferences.

name: Title Narrative
description: The title of the activity, providing a concise summary that captures the essence and main objectives of the activity.

name: Title Narrative Language
description: The language used for the title narrative of the activity. This helps ensure that the title is understood and accessible to diverse audiences.

name: Description Type
description: The type of description provided for the activity, which helps categorize the nature of the information given.

name: Description Narrative
description: A detailed narrative that describes the activity, including its objectives, implementation, context, and outcomes.

name: Description Narrative Language
description: The language used for the description narrative of the activity. This is important for ensuring the description is comprehensible to the intended audience.

name: Participating Organisation Reference
description: A unique identifier for each organisation participating in the activity. This allows for tracking and accountability regarding each organisation's role in the activity.

name: Participating Organisation Type
description: The type of each participating organisation, which provides context about the contributions and roles of different entities within the activity.

name: Participating Organisation Role
description: The specific role that the participating organisation plays in relation to the activity. This clarifies the functions and contributions of each partner.

name: Participating Organisation Activity ID
description: The identifier that is used by the participating organisation to signify their specific activity, facilitating cross-referencing between organisations.

name: Participating Organisation CRS Channel Code
description: A code that signifies the channel through which the participating organisation reports on the activity, important for classification and data analysis.

name: Participating Organisation Narrative
description: A narrative description of the participating organisation, providing additional context on their role and contributions to the activity.

name: Participating Organisation Narrative Language
description: The language used for the narrative description of the participating organisation, ensuring clarity and understanding for diverse audiences.

name: Other Identifier Reference
description: A unique identifier used to reference the activity from another context or system, providing additional means of identification and verification.

name: Other Identifier Type
description: The type of the other identifier, which categorizes the nature of this reference and provides context for its usage.

name: Other Identifier Owner Organisation Reference
description: The unique identifier for the organisation that owns the other identifier, aiding in accountability and linking to the appropriate entity.

name: Other Identifier Owner Organisation Narrative
description: A narrative description of the organisation that owns the other identifier, providing context and information about its role and relevance.

name: Other Identifier Owner Organisation Narrative Language
description: The language used for the narrative description of the organisation that owns the other identifier, ensuring comprehension across language barriers.

name: Activity Status Code
description: The code representing the current status of the activity, helping users understand whether the activity is ongoing, completed, or planned.

name: Activity Date Type
description: The type of date associated with the activity, which may signify when the activity is planned to start, end, or other relevant dates.

name: Activity Date ISO Date
description: The date in ISO format related to the activity. This ensures standardization and clarity regarding the timing of activities.

name: Activity Date Narrative
description: A narrative providing context or additional information about the date associated with the activity, enriching understanding beyond the raw date.

name: Activity Date Narrative Language
description: The language used for the narrative describing the activity date, ensuring the information is accessible to different language speakers.

name: Contact Information Type
description: The type of contact information provided, which may indicate the nature of the contact (e.g., general inquiry, technical details, etc.).

name: Contact Organisation Narrative
description: A narrative description of the organisation responsible for the contact information, clarifying its role in relation to the activity.

name: Contact Organisation Narrative Language
description: The language used for the narrative describing the contact organisation, which helps ensure clarity and understanding.

name: Contact Department Narrative
description: A narrative providing details about the specific department within the organisation that can be contacted regarding the activity.

name: Contact Department Narrative Language
description: The language used for the narrative describing the contact department, enhancing understanding for diverse users.

name: Contact Person Name Narrative
description: The name of the person responsible for contact within the organisation, facilitating direct communication.

name: Contact Person Name Narrative Language
description: The language used for the narrative describing the contact person's name, ensuring clarity for users from different linguistic backgrounds.

name: Contact Job Title Narrative
description: The job title of the contact person within the organisation, providing context regarding their role and responsibility.

name: Contact Job Title Narrative Language
description: The language used for the narrative describing the contact person's job title, ensuring comprehensibility across different languages.

name: Contact Telephone
description: The telephone number to contact the organisation or person related to the activity, facilitating real-time communication.

name: Contact Email
description: The email address for contacting the organisation or person regarding the activity, allowing for written communication.

name: Contact Website
description: The website URL for the organisation, providing additional resources and information regarding the activity.

name: Contact Mailing Address Narrative
description: The narrative that describes the mailing address for the organisation or person, enabling physical correspondence.

name: Contact Mailing Address Narrative Language
description: The language used for the narrative describing the contact mailing address, ensuring the information is understandable.

name: Activity Scope Code
description: The code representing the scope of the activity, indicating the extent of intervention or focus areas.

name: Recipient Country Code
description: The unique code representing the recipient country where the activity takes place, ensuring accurate identification of geographical focus.

name: Recipient Country Percentage
description: The percentage of the activity focused on the recipient country, providing insight into the level of commitment and investment in that area.

name: Recipient Country Narrative
description: A narrative description of the recipient country, offering additional context and detail about the country involved.

name: Recipient Country Narrative Language
description: The language used for the narrative description of the recipient country, helping ensure understanding among varied audiences.

name: Recipient Region Code
description: The unique code representing the recipient region where the activity takes place, critical for regional analysis and reporting.

name: Recipient Region Vocabulary
description: The vocabulary used to classify the recipient region, which provides context for the type of regions involved in the activity.

name: Recipient Region Vocabulary URI
description: The URI that points to the vocabulary used for classifying recipient regions, enabling resource linking and enhanced interoperability.

name: Recipient Region Percentage
description: The percentage of the activity focused on the recipient region, illustrating the extent of engagement within that region.

name: Recipient Region Narrative
description: A narrative description of the recipient region, providing details and context beyond the code.

name: Recipient Region Narrative Language
description: The language used for the narrative description of the recipient region, facilitating understanding across diverse language speakers.

name: Location Reference
description: A unique identifier for the location associated with the activity, enabling accurate geographic tagging and reporting.

name: Location Location Reach Code
description: The code indicating the reach of the location in relation to the activity, providing insight into the scale of implementation.

name: Location Location ID Code
description: The unique code used to identify the specific location associated with the activity, important for precise geo-spatial recognition.

name: Location Location ID Vocabulary
description: The vocabulary used to define the location ID, fostering clarity in categorization and enabling interoperability.

name: Location Name Narrative
description: A narrative description of the location associated with the activity, providing context and detail beyond the mere identifiers.

name: Location Name Narrative Language
description: The language used for the narrative describing the location, enhancing accessibility and comprehension for diverse users.

name: Location Description Narrative
description: A narrative providing a detailed description of the location, adding further context and information related to the activity.

name: Location Description Narrative Language
description: The language used for the narrative description of the location, ensuring clear communication of information.

name: Location Activity Description Narrative
description: A narrative that describes how the activity is related to the specific location, emphasizing contextual relevance.

name: Location Activity Description Narrative Language
description: The language used for the narrative describing the relationship between the activity and the location, enhancing clarity in communication.

name: Location Administrative Code
description: The administrative code associated with the location, facilitating governance and jurisdictional understanding.

name: Location Administrative Vocabulary
description: The vocabulary used to classify the administrative identifiers of the location, aiding in consistent categorization.

name: Location Administrative Level
description: A numerical indicator of the administrative level of the location, which helps to understand the governance structure related to the activity.

name: Location Point SRS Name
description: The spatial reference system name for the location point, essential for mapping and geo-spatial analysis.

name: Location Point Position
description: The geographic coordinates (longitude and latitude) of the activity location, providing precise location information.

name: Location Exactness Code
description: The code indicating the precision of the geographical information regarding the location, which influences interpretation and analysis.

name: Location Location Class Code
description: The classification code that categorizes the type of location relevant to the activity, which aids in data organization.

name: Location Feature Designation Code
description: The code used to specify the feature designation of the location, providing additional context for interpretation.

name: Sector Vocabulary
description: The vocabulary used to classify sectors associated with the activity, helping in categorizing and analyzing activities.

name: Sector Vocabulary URI
description: The URI that links to the sector vocabulary used in classifying sectors, enhancing data interoperability.

name: Sector Code
description: The unique code representing the sector associated with the activity, essential for categorizing the nature of the activity.

name: Sector Percentage
description: The percentage of the activity focused on each sector, providing insight into the distribution of resources and attention.

name: Sector Narrative
description: A narrative description of the sector(s) associated with the activity, adding context and insights beyond the codes.

name: Sector Narrative Language
description: The language used for the narrative description of the sector, ensuring clarity and comprehension for diverse audiences.

name: Tag Code
description: The unique code representing the tags that are assigned to the activity, which assists in classifying and analyzing it.

name: Tag Vocabulary
description: The vocabulary used to classify the tags related to the activity, enhancing data interpretation and use.

name: Tag Narrative
description: A narrative description of the tags assigned to the activity, providing a richer context and understanding of their relevance.

name: Tag Narrative Language

name: Country Budget Items Vocabulary
description: The vocabulary used to classify the country budget items associated with the activity, enabling consistency in categorization.

name: Country Budget Item Code

name: Country Budget Item Percentage

name: Country Budget Item Description Narrative

name: Country Budget Item Description Narrative Language

name: Humanitarian Scope Type
description: The type of humanitarian scope relevant to the activity, providing context around the humanitarian objectives and focus.

name: Humanitarian Scope Vocabulary
description: The vocabulary used to classify the types of humanitarian scope, enhancing consistency in humanitarian reporting.

name: Humanitarian Scope Vocabulary URI

name: Humanitarian Scope Code

name: Humanitarian Scope Narrative

name: Humanitarian Scope Narrative Language

name: Default Flow Type Code
description: The code indicating the default flow type of funding for the activity, which helps in classifying the direction of financial flow.

name: Default Finance Type Code
description: The code representing the default finance type associated with the activity, which aids in classifying the nature of financial resources used.

name: Default Aid Type Vocabulary
description: The vocabulary used to classify the default aid types associated with the activity, ensuring consistency in classification.

name: Default Tied Status Code
description: The code representing the tied status of the aid provided in the activity, indicating whether the aid is tied to specific uses or conditions.

name: Budget Type
description: The type of budget related to the activity, which helps define the nature of financial planning and allocations.

name: Budget Status
description: The status of the budget, providing information on whether the budget is approved, revised, or finalized.

name: Budget Period Start ISO Date
description: The start date of the budget period in ISO format, essential for understanding the time frame of budget allocations.

name: Budget Period End ISO Date
description: The end date of the budget period in ISO format, helping to define the time boundaries for budget implementation.

name: Budget Value
description: The total monetary value of the budget allocated for the activity, indicating the financial resources dedicated to it.

name: Budget Value Currency
description: The currency in which the budget value is reported, ensuring clarity regarding the financial figures provided.

name: Budget Value Date
description: The date associated with the budget value, providing context on when the budget figures were reported or applicable.

name: Planned Disbursement Period Start ISO Date
description: The start date of the planned disbursement period in ISO format, indicating when funds are expected to be allocated.

name: Planned Disbursement Period End ISO Date
description: The end date of the planned disbursement period in ISO format, defining the time frame for expected disbursements.

description: The currency in which the planned disbursement value is reported, ensuring clarity regarding financial figures.

name: Planned Disbursement Provider Organisation Narrative Language

name: CRS Add Other Flags Code
description: Codes representing additional flags associated with the CRS Add data, which may indicate specific considerations or attributes.

name: CRS Add Other Flags Significance
description: A boolean value indicating the significance of the other flags associated with the CRS Add data, providing context for their relevance.

name: CRS Add Loan Terms Rate 1
description: The first rate associated with the loan terms of the activity, indicating the interest rate applicable to the loan provided.

name: CRS Add Loan Terms Rate 2
description: The second rate associated with the loan terms of the activity, indicating any additional interest rate that may apply.

name: CRS Add Loan Terms Repayment Type Code
description: The code representing the repayment type for the loan terms associated with the activity, clarifying the repayment structure.

name: CRS Add Loan Terms Repayment Plan Code
description: The code representing the repayment plan for the loan terms, outlining how and when repayments will occur.

name: CRS Add Loan Terms Commitment Date ISO Date
description: The date the loan terms were committed, recorded in ISO format to provide a clear timeline for the agreement.

name: CRS Add Loan Terms Repayment First Date ISO Date
description: The date when the first repayment on the loan is due, recorded in ISO format for clarity and compliance.

name: CRS Add Loan Terms Repayment Final Date ISO Date
description: The date when the final repayment on the loan is due, recorded in ISO format, marking the completion of the repayment.

name: CRS Add Loan Status Year
description: The year associated with the loan status, helping to identify when the loan status was reported or updated.

name: CRS Add Loan Status Currency
description: The currency in which the loan status values are reported, ensuring clarity on financial figures.

name: CRS Add Loan Status Value Date
description: The date associated with the loan status value, providing context regarding when the reported value was applicable.

name: CRS Add Loan Status Interest Received
description: The amount of interest received on the loan as per the loan status, indicating financial performance.

name: CRS Add Loan Status Principal Outstanding
description: The outstanding principal amount of the loan as per the loan status, crucial for understanding repayment obligations.

name: CRS Add Loan Status Principal Arrears
description: The amount of the principal that is in arrears, helping identify overdue loan obligations.

name: CRS Add Loan Status Interest Arrears
description: The amount of interest that is in arrears on the loan, indicating overdue payments.

name: CRS Add Channel Code
description: The code indicating the channel through which the loan or funding is provided, assisting in categorizing the distribution mechanisms.

name: FSS Extraction Date
description: The date when the FSS data was extracted, providing context on the recency of the information.

name: FSS Priority
description: A boolean value indicating whether the FSS entry is a priority, highlighting its importance within the dataset.

name: FSS Phaseout Year
description: The year when the phaseout of the FSS funding or activity is expected to occur, indicating the timeline for transition.

name: FSS Forecast
description: The forecasted values associated with the funding or activity under FSS, providing projections for future commitments.

name: FSS Forecast Year
description: The years for which the FSS forecasts are made, enabling tracking of financial projections over time.

name: FSS Forecast Currency
description: The currency in which the FSS forecast values are reported, ensuring clarity regarding the financial figures.

name: FSS Forecast Value Date
description: The date associated with the forecast value under FSS, providing context for when the projection is applicable.

name: Dataset ID
description: A unique identifier for the dataset, which allows for easy tracking and referencing of the specific dataset.

name: Dataset Metadata Created
description: The date when the metadata for the dataset was created, in ISO format for standardization.

name: Dataset Metadata Modified
description: The date when the metadata for the dataset was last modified, in ISO format, ensuring users know the currency of the data.

name: Dataset Name
description: The name of the dataset, providing a clear and concise title that describes the contents of the dataset.

name: Dataset IATI Version
description: The version of the IATI standard used for the dataset, indicating compliance with IATI guidelines.

name: Dataset Publisher IATI ID
description: The IATI identifier of the publisher of the dataset, linking the dataset to the specific publisher organisation.

name: Dataset Publisher
description: The name of the organisation that published the dataset, providing context about the source of the information.

name: Dataset Data Updated
description: The date when the actual data within the dataset was last updated, in ISO format, ensuring users have access to the latest information.

name: Dataset Resource Hash
description: A hash value representing the dataset resource, used for verifying data integrity and tracking changes.

name: Dataset Resource Last Modified
description: The date when the resource associated with the dataset was last modified, in ISO format, assisting users in verifying data currency.

name: Dataset Resource URL
description: The URL where the dataset resource can be accessed, providing users with direct links to the data.
